title: How Russian sanctions changed the equation for the Fed's economic toolkit
description: Jeanne Whalen, global business reporter for the Washington Post and Amara Omeoke, economics reporter at the Wall Street Journal, join Chuck to talk about the Fed's plans to rein in inflation without tipping the economy into a recession.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Jeanne Whalen, global business reporter for the Washington Post and Amara Omeoke, economics reporter at the Wall Street Journal, join Chuck to talk about the Fed's plans to rein in inflation without tipping the economy into a recession.
